alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 7:00PM EDT until June 17 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Okaloosa County in northwestern Florida... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 600 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Valparaiso, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Niceville, Destin, Eglin AFB, Valparaiso, Lake Lorraine and Shalimar. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
